data.name: Fomalhaut Flowers
data.detailed_description:
Go in search of rare flowers and uncover the terrible secret of Fomalhaut.

"Fomalhaut Flowers" - a minimalistic 2D platformer with a side view, in which the player, avoiding enemies and traps, needs to collect all the rare flowers to solve the mystery of one of the planets of Fomalhaut.

Game features:
- 24 atmospheric levels with a memorable visual style;
- Unpredictable behavior of enemies, making each passage unique;
- The ability to interact with some objects to solve game problems;
- Meditative gameplay;
- Unexpected ending of the game.

Attention! This game is difficult in terms of passing and is intended for experienced players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: with a frequency of 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: not older than 5 years
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
